tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.2.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: In Country
programme.desc: Central Command coordinates an airstrike on a confirmed target traveling through Afghanistan. After the strike is launched, marine troops assess the damage and they are disturbed to learn that they targeted the wrong vehicle and hit civilians instead.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Enemy Below
programme.desc: Kabir is preparing an attack against the U.S. and was last seen crossing the border from Afghanistan to Iran. He is believed to have recruited Capt. Yerastov, a Russian submarine captain. Turner, Harm and Mac help in the hunt for the terrorists.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Critical Condition
programme.desc: Bud has lost his right lower leg due to a mine in Afghanistan; during emergency surgery he faces bad trouble. Sturgis returns to Washington, and Harm and Mac disobey an order from the admiral. Bud encounters an astounding change of course.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Dangerous Game
programme.desc: A deputy sheriff dies while chasing a car carrying two SEALs in a Navy exercise. The driver stands trial for negligent homicide.(n)

programme.title: JAG: In Thin Air
programme.desc: Lt. Albrecht and Lt. Cmdr. Zuzello make Zuzello’s farewell flight before he retires. All is fine until Albrecht notices that his partner is passed out from hypoxia. Albrecht makes an emergency landing on the ship.Harm is sent to the ship to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Talismans
programme.desc: When a military plane is shot down in Bosnia, Team Scorpion must help recover its stealth technology before it falls into enemy hands.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Revenge
programme.desc: When Sylvester accidentally triggers an explosive device during an investigation, Team Scorpion must focus on finding who's responsible even while their friend's life hangs in the balance.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Dominoes
programme.desc: As Christmas approaches, Team Scorpion races to find a way to save a young boy's life after he gets trapped in a beachside cave and drowning is imminent.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Kill Screen
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must help Ralph when the FBI questions him after his dark web game play inadvertently reveals the location of a CIA safe house and results in the murder of CIA operatives.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Charades
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is tasked with uncovering a mole inside the CIA whose judgment is clouded by matters of the heart and is being coerced into stealing deadly chemicals.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Forget Me Nots
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must jog the memory of an injured former Secret Service agent who is their only hope of preventing weapons of mass destruction being launched from a secret U.S. nuclear silo.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Out Of Time
programme.desc: After the officers of 15 Division are forced to release a suspected predator, the grim discovery of the body of a missing girl reopens an unsolved case – bringing back Detective Luke Callaghan in from the Homicide Squad to oversee it.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Cold Comforts
programme.desc: The officers of 15 Division are still reeling in the aftermath of the unexpected death of one of their colleagues. When they discover that a laptop has been stolen containing sensitive information, they set out to tie up several of open cases.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: The Rules
programme.desc: Itʼs “back to basics” for 15 Division when Staff Sergeant Frank Best decides itʼs time for his officers to get back on track.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Every Man
programme.desc: A seasonʼs worth of trials and tribulations come to a head during a frenzied night at the station when the distracted rookies improperly search a prisoner.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: I Never
programme.desc: When a violent child abductor escapes from an emergency hospital visit, 15 Division goes on the hunt for the criminal -- only to discover that heʼs taken another young victim.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Surprises
programme.desc: After six months working undercover, Andy and Nick’s operation goes sideways when Nick, then Andy go missing. Meanwhile, a random arrest at 15 Division puts Sam Swarek and the other officers in the middle of the investigation-turned-rescue-mission.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Ripon Prison
programme.desc: A small prison in Yorkshire gives a big impact when Yvette and her team attempt to stay the night. Although many inmates were released some are still locked up and they are not happy.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Ripon Workhouse
programme.desc: In a place where the homeless were kept and work was hard, death was often the only escape but it seems that wasn’t the way for some as their souls are said to roam this place.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Standon Hall Part 1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding and her team take on a three-part investigation that tests them to the very core. A place that surprised intrigued and terrified the hardened team, making Standon Hall the most fearful place they have investigated.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Standon Hall Part 2
programme.desc: Part two of this mammoth investigation and Yvette has some harsh words for Karl as he decides to take a risk that proves too dangerous. With something that wants them out, the investigation gets aggressive.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Standon Hall Part 3
programme.desc: The concluding part of the team’s most scary investigation to date, but will they last the night as something definitely wants them out.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Slaughter House
programme.desc: The Slaughterhouse is Liverpool’s oldest pub and gives the team more than they bargained for as object are moved from underneath the team’s noses.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Plot Thickens
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, owners of a haunted theatre in Woonsocket, Rhode Island buy the building next door and activity spikes! TAPS investigates both buildings to see if spirits are traveling between the two locations.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Inhuman Entity
programme.desc: The TAPS team answers a call from a family in Blackstone, Massachusetts being plagued by a demonic entity.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Time To Get Touched
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Ohio and to the Thurber house, the home of author James Thurber, whowrote The Night the Ghost Got In based off his paranormal experiences there.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Unexplained Phenomena
programme.desc: This week, TAPS takes a call from the American Legion in Pennsylvania where people are terrified by paranormals.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: America's First Zoo
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to the oldest zoo in the country, The Philadelphia Zoo, which boastsa reported Native American burial ground that lies beneath the grounds.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Sum of Its Parts
programme.desc: Andromeda is boarded by a drone from the Consensus of Parts, a mythical mechanical society. While friendly at first, the drone tries to force the ship to join the Consensus.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Fear and Loathing in the Milky Way
programme.sub-title: Fear and Loathing in the Milky Way
programme.desc: Gerentex is back, and demands Trance and Harper help him with his new scheme: finding Tarn-Vedra.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Devil Take the Hindmost
programme.desc: Dylan and Rev Bem help a peaceful society to stand up to their would-be slavers. They have to be careful because if Dylan teaches them to kill, their kids will be born knowing it.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Honey Offering
programme.desc: Dylan attempts to bring peace to two different Nietzschean prides by escorting the princess of one to her arranged marriage to the prince of the other.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Star-Crossed
programme.desc: Rommie's avatar falls in love with what turns out to be the avatar of a warship named Gabriel. Gabriel attempts to infect Rommie with a virus that broadcasts its plans to the warship.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: It Makes a Lovely Light
programme.desc: Beka takes the Andromeda to Tarn-Vedra, but extended time in the slipstream causes side effects. To combat them, Beka starts taking Flash and soon becomes addicted.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.74
programme.desc: Young woman hit by car at underage drinking party blames icy driveway; driver claims she should have moved. Siblings fight over deceased father's home ownership, leading to a feud.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.169
programme.desc: Woman accuses toddler's grandmother of selling her belongings during prison term. Man denies dating former friend suing for unpaid loans and ring return, suggests she move on.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.259
programme.desc: A young tenant disputes custody of a band's equipment and unpaid rent with former landlords. Man sues seller and girlfriend for refund after alleged failed vehicle purchase from online ad.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.39
programme.desc: Ex-lovers dispute Suzuki motorcycle purchase, crash, and cancelled insurance.Young man arrested for assault, fails drug test, violates probation, bailed out by girlfriend; he claims bailout was birthday gift.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.45
programme.desc: A woman accuses her former live-in boyfriend of vandalism and skipping out on his share of the rent/Alleged harassment that led to a man’s dismissal at work and a dispute over an unpaid loan land ex-lovers in court.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.8
programme.desc: Teenagers dispute damages after breakup: iPhone thrown, windshield damaged/Judge Judy illustrates loan with paper scraps as unwed mother sues child's father for startup loan.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.2
programme.desc: Young man sues ex-lover for car repossession; demands down payment/Father sues son for loan; son claims partial forgiveness.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.20
programme.desc: Woman accuses ex of cheating in her home, he sues for furniture disposal and clothes destruction/Woman sues ex-roommate for back rent amid marijuana accusations, countersued for damaged property cost.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.207
programme.desc: Man regrets buying '95 Thunderbird, sued by fiancée's ex-friend. Another man claims god brother's estranged wife towed his car. Dog handler sues former customers over Chihuahua cost due to alleged gift card fraud.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.65
programme.desc: Man allegedly damages SUV during child custody exchange, claims admission under duress. Teenager sued by older sister for scooter balance; teen claims vehicle given in exchange for care of grandmother.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.141
programme.desc:
Alleged assaults and vicious scratching, rumors about injuring a			
child, and unpaid bills divide ex-lovers.			
Paternity tests and trailer storage come into play when a woman			
sues her daughter’s former friend for 13 months worth of rent.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Paris Hilton is in attendance at the dinner service, but will she prove more of a distraction or just be distracted?(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Using only their eyesight, their noses and their taste buds, the four remaining chefs must re-create a dish without a recipe.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs must create fusion dishes by mixing cuisines from two different countries, the winner has a dinner date with Chef Ramsay and their family while the losers participate in moving day.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The two finalists are taken to LA Market where the winner will work, and told to cook five dishes for a taste test.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The signature dish challenge kicks of Gordon Ramsay's US cooking competition, with the most successful team getting to enjoy a lunch at the LA Market restaurant.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: With a trip to Palm Springs in a private jet up for grabs, the contestants compete by cooking four pieces of meat to Chef Ramsay's instructions.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Pizza Pizza CEO Paul Goddard goes undercover in the nation’s number one pizza mega brand, and learns that making dough and delivering pizza serves up some challenges he never imagined.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Sam Taylor, the President & CEO of Oriental Trading Company, the largest retailer of party supplies in the United States, is going undercover in hopes of finding that the company’s mission of “selling fun.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The Victorian Order of Nurses takes the pressure off hospitals by providing care for people in their own homes. Hundreds of rival companies compete for cash and customers.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Stacey Mowbray, CEO of Canada’s largest specialty coffee company goes undercover and gets into the grind serving lattes to get an edge on customer service and revive her connection with frontline workers.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Toronto Transit Commission (TTC) City Councillor and TTC Chair Karen Stintz goes undercover inside the country's largest mass transit system to get her hands dirty with some of the toughest and grittiest jobs.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Fun Run
programme.desc: After Jeff tells his altruistic co-workers that requests for charity donations are getting out of hand, Audrey enters into a 10K charity event and plans on having Jeff's staff contribute money toward the cause.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Refusing To Budget
programme.desc: Timmy convinces Russell he needs a budget when the utilities are turned off in his apartment. Meanwhile, Audrey has a mentee who wants to see her office and learn about publishing.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Little Bummer Boy
programme.desc: When Russell decides to borrow a holiday concept of gift-giving from Adam, both Adam and his co-workers are in for surprises. Meanwhile, Audrey wants to make people laugh at Jeff's holiday party.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Home Stretch
programme.desc: When Jeff discovers that a guy is giving Audrey home Pilates classes, he wants to make a change. Meanwhile, Adam tells Jennifer specifics about his football past.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Uh-Oh It's Magic
programme.desc: When Russell takes his date to a magic show, the magician makes her disappear. Meanwhile, Audrey unknowingly slips up when she tells Brenda's girlfriend about the baby.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Singing and Dancing
programme.desc: When Timmy joins an a cappella group, he wants to keep it a secret from Russell. Meanwhile, Jeff and Audrey discover they have a new annoying neighbor.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Anniversary Chicken
programme.desc: When Jeff decides to surprise Audrey by remembering their anniversary, he's the one who ends up being surprised. Meanwhile, Timmy is forced to be Russell's interpreter on a date.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff's Day
programme.desc: When Jeff proclaims it's 'Jeff Day', he gets his way until the cleaning lady arrives. Meanwhile, Adam has to figure out why his eye is twitching.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Zygote
programme.desc: When Jeff and Audrey see a fertility specialist with their surrogate, they discover a zygote. Meanwhile, Russell and Timmy go on double dates again.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Set Up
programme.desc: When Russell discovers Timmy has a sister, he aims to impress her. Meanwhile, Jeff and Audrey set their neighbor Liz up on a date.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Beating the System
programme.desc: When Jeff and Audrey learn their surrogate is pregnant, both of their lives change. Meanwhile, Timmy takes on the responsibility of wedding planner for Adam and Jennifer.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Up on the Roof
programme.desc: Today, Dog and the family are back in Colorado and are about to make one of their most exciting captures ever. When the adrenaline-fueled arrest goes down, every family member will play a critical role.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Family Business
programme.desc: Dog and the Chapman clan start their hunt today with another well-established bail bonding family. As Dog's fame has grown, so have his responsibilities.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Felons Interrupted
programme.desc: Dog is confronted with two alleged felons in crisis. Family and friends of these bondees are convinced that they are getting into further trouble while awaiting trial, so Dog and the posse have to bring these men back to jail.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Let It Snow
programme.desc: Christopher is barely 21, already has a history of domestic abuse and assault, and is facing major time in a room without a view. This hunt won't be easy for Dog - the leads are few, informers and family are not forthcoming.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rush from Judgment
programme.desc: Facing hard time for forging checks, Melissa pulled a vanishing act at her sentencing hearing, bolting from the courthouse in broad daylight. Lucky for her bondsman, Dog and his posse are in Colorado and ready to help.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Burn & Return
programme.desc: Dog is busy. First, he's after a fugitive who is allegedly an expert in the game of "burn and return"- shoplifting goods to return them for cash refunds. But he's not easy to track.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Stormy Weather
programme.desc: Going after two fugitives in one day is tough enough without the facing Colorado's notoriously unpredictable weather. Today, it's the threat of severe thunderstorms, hail and area wide tornado warnings.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: One for the Money
programme.desc: It hurts Dog to see people who after years of walking the straight and narrow, suddenly lose their way. But today's case is a member of the law enforcement community who has recently gone astray, and that truly troubles the Dog.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Samurai Si
programme.desc: Willie receives a special gift from a Japanese business associate - a "priceless" samurai sword, which Willie keeps out of the hands of Jase and the guys.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck No, We Won't Go
programme.desc: Willie pushes his work force too far after implementing new "motivational work tactics," and the guys rise up against him and go on strike.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drag Me To Glory
programme.desc: When NASCAR sensation Clint Bowyer pays a visit to the Duck Commander warehouse, Willie and the guys are fired up to spend the day hanging out with the professional racecar driver.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Season Eve
programme.desc: Tomorrow is the opening day of Duck Season and the men are carrying on their tradition of camping on the Robertson Land the night before.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Can't Hardly Weight
programme.desc: Gearing up for his high school reunion, Willie realizes that he could stand to lose a few pounds. Jase and Korie set out to help him drop some weight and the strenuous battle of man-versus-waistline begins.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Shot Thru The Heart
programme.desc: The guys learn from Willie that John Luke is going through his first break up. In order to make him feel better the men decide to take John Luke hunting for nutria, and impart their relationship wisdom.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Lizard, Lizard
programme.desc: When the warehouse guys new office pet (a lizard) escapes, they try all they can in order to catch the wily reptile. Proving impossible, the guys finally decide to bring in the big guns to help trap it--Mr. Phil Robertson.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hallu-Si-Nations
programme.desc: With Willie out-of-town, the guys decide to flake off work and leave to brush up the duck blinds on the Robertson land. While out, Si believes he spots what he thinks is the infamous 'Black Panther'.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Let's Go Hunting, Deer
programme.desc: Willie and Jase invite Korie and Missy along on a deer hunt because they believe their wives have become too "city." At Phil and Kay's, Miss Kay decides she wants to frame Phil's original blueprints from the first duck call he created.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Tickets To The Fun Show
programme.desc: During Duck Commander's "Casino Night" party, Si Robertson wins the grand prize of $2000 and decides to buy a massage chair for the duck call room. The massage chair becomes a detriment to the workflow, so Willie takes Si around for a replacement prize.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Be a Lady
programme.desc: Sadie, has a homecoming dance coming up, but Willie doesn't approve of her dress selection. Willie decides to take Sadie out to find her a new "appropriate" dress.(n)

programme.title: Time Runners
programme.desc: Special Agent Sally Biggs has a secret, she can rewind time whenever she wants. It's enough to make her a celebrity at the FBI and allows her to control almost everything in her life... Except for the disappearance of her husband.(n)

programme.title: Left Behind
programme.desc: A small group of survivors are left behind after millions of people suddenly vanish and the world is plunged into chaos and destruction.(n)

programme.title: Meteor Apocalypse
programme.desc: In this End Times thriller, a gigantic meteor enters Earth's orbit and begins to disintegrate, showering the planet in poisonous debris.(n)

programme.title: George And The Dragon
programme.desc: A knight (James Purefoy, "Rome") returning from the Crusades takes on a dragon after the disappearance of the kindly Princess Lunna (Piper Perabo, "Coyote Ugly"). With Patrick Swayze.(n)

programme.title: For The Love Of Benji
programme.desc: Benji is back! En route to a vacation in Greece Benji becomes separated from the family in Athens, Benji finds himself on the run from an assortment of international spies seeking an energy scientist, who has been working on a secret formula.(n)

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum. Starring: Morgan Freeman, Christopher Walken, Joseph McKenna, Wynn Everett.(n)

programme.title: 2012: Ice Age
programme.desc: When a volcanic eruption in Iceland sends a glacier hurtling toward North America, a family struggles to escape the onslaught of the coming ice age.(n)

programme.title: The Battle of Midway: Dauntless
programme.desc: A U.S. carrier group is positioned off the coast of Midway in June 1942. During the battle, the two-man crew of a U.S. Navy dive bomber is forced to ditch in the sea. Amid the vast openness of the Pacific, the men are forced to face their own mortality.(n)

programme.title: Redline
programme.desc: Starring Eddie Griffin and Nathan Phillips. With the speedometer maxed out, a group of exotic car fanatics hit the streets in hopes of winning a life-changing sum of 24 million dollars. Every rule is broken as these drivers.(n)

programme.title: Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: In a quest to find a lost colleague, a team of scientists find themselves deep underground in an ancient labyrinth, while trying to unearth a secret that has been buried for centuries.(n)

programme.title: 48 Christmas Wishes
programme.desc: After losing an entire town's letters to Santa, two junior Elves leave the North Pole and attempt to blend into small town life as they set out to retrieve every missing wish before Santa's sleigh departs on Christmas Eve.(n)

programme.title: K9 Christmas: Scoot & Kassie's Christmas Adventure
programme.desc: Kassie rescues Scoot, a former K-9 police dog, who becomes her best friend. But when two men turn up to work at the bank that Kassie's dad (Luke Perry) manages she finds out they are crooks with plans to get their hands on all the money and ruin Christmas.(n)

programme.title: My Best Friend's Christmas
programme.desc: When Ashley’s plans to reconnect with her high school sweetheart over Christmas fails, she and her best friend Liam decide to fake their own romance. But as her feelings start to turn real, Ashley will have to decide what her heart really wants.(n)

programme.title: Holiday Joy
programme.desc: A shy high school student's Christmas wish comes true only it isn't exactly as wonderful as she'd hoped.(n)

programme.title: Stressed to Death
programme.desc: A former EMT still stricken with PTSD over not being able to save a man's life in time, becomes the target of the victim's wealthy wife who blames her for his death.(n)

programme.title: Clover Bend
programme.desc: An LA cop whose wife is killed in a shootout moves back to his hometown, trying to rebuild a life for himself and his children. Unbeknownst to him, his wife's killers are seeking revenge for one of their own who was also killed in the shootout.(n)

programme.title: Winter Ridge
programme.desc: A young detective is torn apart after his wife ends up in a coma while hunting a serial-killer at the same time.(n)

programme.title: Churchill
programme.desc: British Prime Minister Winston Churchill clashes with his political opponents as D-Day nears in June 1944. Clementine, his devoted wife, tries to prevent his physical, mental and spiritual collapse while inspiring him to achieve greatness.(n)

programme.title: Summerland
programme.desc: A reclusive Englishwoman opens her heart to a young evacuee as World War II rages across the channel.(n)

programme.title: Megan Leavey
programme.desc: Young Marine Cpl. Megan Leavey starts to identify with Rex, a particularly aggressive combat dog that she trains. Together, they complete more than 100 missions until an improvised explosive device injures both, putting their fates in jeopardy.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A condemned killer being transported by train murders a marshal and takes Mark hostage.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark discovers that the new preacher and his wife are impostors planning a robbery.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Marshall Torrance get into trouble with the Army when they try to help a wounded young soldier who deserted.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After Mark contracts typhoid fever and has a vision of his dead mother he no longer seems interested in getting well.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An old friend of Lucas's returns to town in the company of a shady gambler and is accused of cheating at cards.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Several men are vying for a prosperous rancher's daughter's affections. When she is found dead, one of them becomes the prime suspect in her murder.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas receives a series of mysterious threatening notes from an ex-convict with a grudge.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: To keep his invalid mother happy, an outlaw forces Lucas and Mark to go along with a masquerade that he is the owner of Lucas's ranch.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas helps his former Army captain, now an undercover federal agent, infiltrate a gang of bank robbers.(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Robo Rex
programme.desc: James Miller has only one friend in the world, his beloved Labrador Retriever, Rex. But when a strange capsule lands in the his backyard and a robot dog emerges, his life will never be the same.(n)

programme.title: Foster
programme.desc: A heart-warming story of family and friendship starring Academy Award Nominee Toni Collette and Ioan Gruffudd.(n)

programme.title: The Silver Brumby
programme.desc: In the unforgiving wilderness of the Australian Alps, there roams a stallion like no other, the Silver Brumby. Now, one horseman sets off on an unforgettable adventure to capture the horse that according to legend, could never be tamed.(n)

programme.title: Unicorn City
programme.desc: To prove leadership skills to a potential employer, Voss, a hardcore gamer entices his gamer buddies to create a utopia, but paradise is disrupted when his former nemesis and guild master decides to wage war for the city and the heart of Voss’ true love.(n)

programme.title: My Bakery in Brooklyn
programme.desc: Two cousins, two kinds of thinking, and a bakery for saving.(n)

programme.title: National Lampoon's Gold Diggers
programme.desc: A pair of losers marry two elderly sisters, thinking they'll inherit their fortune and Beverly Hills estate.(n)

programme.title: Battling for Baby
programme.desc: After Katherine (Courteney Cox) decides to return to work to help pay the bills, her baby's grandmothers (Debbie Reynolds & Suzanne Pleshette) argue over who will take care of her child.(n)

programme.title: Night of the Eagle
programme.desc: A sceptical college professor learns the true power of the occult when he attempts to rescue his wife from Satanists.(n)

programme.title: The House in Nightmare Park
programme.desc: A struggling actor is invited to a large country home to perform a dramatic reading. Outwardly, the host is complimentary and enthusiastic, but his more sinister intentions are eventually made clear.(n)

programme.title: The Uncanny
programme.desc: An author, convinced that cats are conspiring to replace the human race as masters of the earth, narrates three bizarre tales of feline terror.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: So Shall It Be
programme.desc: When Sidney and Nigel are about to enter the site of a Bristol lecture, a young author approaches them to follow up immediately on a tip about a map to the lost keys to the druid cult in Stonehenge.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Buddha's Bowl
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel head to Nepal to recover Buddha's fabled overflowing alms bowl for villagers who are building a shrine to the original Buddha.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Headless Nun
programme.desc: When Sydney's plane crashes, she's asked by a group of nuns to find the head of another nun who was decapitated several centuries ago.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Smoking Gun
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel search for Al Capone's diamond-encrusted gun at the behest of a man hoping it will clear his grandfather of a murder he was framed for.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Bad Girls (REDUX)
programme.desc: When a wealthy socialite and his two daughters book the Tulip for a passage to Mars, Percy and the destructive young women become fast friends, creating serious trouble for Dante.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: A mutant with telepathic abilities who can make people experience, mentally, anything he wants manages to get into the minds of Mutant X. Now he is making them experience their worst fears.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: When Mutant X and Genomex are captured on film using their powers, they both have to deal with the reporter who plans to go public with the information.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Shalimar's former boyfriend shows up and is trying to recover a Fabergé Egg that holds a microchip of extraordinary power.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team tries to stop Eckhart from acquiring a rare element, but a thief gets it. The woman who has the ability to make men fall in love with her sets her sights on Brennan.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Summit
programme.desc: Da'an leaves and doesn't being Liam along. Zo'or is frantic as to why Da'an left. Liam wants to help but Zo'or doesn't trust him because he doesn't have a CVI, so Liam agrees to be implanted.(n)
